name: Security Access
description: You're standing in a security room. There is a vault door in the north wall. To the south is a white door. There's a table here{belt}.

args: When you approach the vault door, you can hear mechanics hidden in the walls start to operate. A moment later, the vault door swings open. Then you hear a clang in the mechanics somewhere and a mechanical voice says "ERROR. INTERNAL MECHANISM FAULT. VAULT DOOR CANNOT BE CLOSED." At least you won't get trapped inside!

When you approach the vault door, you can hear mechanics hidden in the walls start to operate. A moment later, they stop and you hear a mechanical voice: "ERROR. ISSUE WITH MECHANICAL ROOM. VAULT DOOR INOPERABLE.".

features.look: It's a huge metal vault door. Hint: Just try going north. You don't have to interact specifically with the vault door.
It's a belt. Like, not the kind you wear, the kind that connect pulleys together. You know, the mechanical kind of belt.
take: You take the belt from the table.
